docna.cdata!:
Tanzania - Geita Cotton Project : Credit
            0454 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Tanzania - Geita Cotton Project :
            Credit 0454 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Tanzania - Geita Cotton Project : Credit
            0454 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Tanzania - Geita Cotton Project :
            Credit 0454 - Credit Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The Cotton Project will provide for the
            expansion of cotton and maize production in Geita district
            of Mwanza region by providing fertilizers and other inputs,
            tractors and maintenance facilities, storage, feeder road
            construction, a ginnery water supply and related technical
            and extension services and training. Health and education
            facilities will also be provided.
